definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: While you're brushing your teeth with a fluoride toothpaste, brush your tongue – especially the back of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 當你用含氟化物的牙膏刷牙和清潔舌頭特別是舌背時。

sentences.english: Worried about escaping of the fish, you laughed at yourself and thought how ridiculous the previous mind was.
sentences.chinese: 一面擔心魚逃了，一面來東笑自家原先背時的得。
